actionList.title: Board Meeting Public Comment
actionList.textContent: The next PPS board meeting will be held November 16th. Community members wishing to provide public comment can do so virtually. If you would like to sign up for public comment, please send an email with your first and last name, your school community, and topic to PublicComment@pps.net or call the Board Office at 503-916-3741. Requests for public comment will be processed in the order that they are received. Email and phone requests should be received by 12:00 pm the day of the meeting. Please note, public comment by any individual is limited to one time every 30 days. Written public comment may be sent to:

actionList.title: Konstella Parent Guardians Group SEGC Survey
actionList.textContent: Please take this internal, anonymous survey to help us develop a consistent and focused message to present to the SEGC and PPS.

actionList.title: SEGC FeedBack Form
actionList.htmlContent: Share your feedback on the on the phase 2 process.

actionList.title: SEGC Question Comment Form
actionList.htmlContent: submit any questions or comments you might have regarding the SEGC proposals.

actionList.title: Petition to Save Woodstock School
actionList.textContent: IMPORTANT: this site is soliciting other petitions and asking for donations. This is a free platform, just skip those requests.  Please DO NOT donate/contribute/chip in money.

eventList.title: PPS Board Meeting, Nov. 16th, 6pm
eventList.textContent: At this point, it is unclear what will be shared at the Board and SEGC meetings, but there will hopefully be an update on the existing proposals, the new proposal development, and next steps. You can watch the live stream through the link.

eventList.title: SECG Meeting, Nov 18th 6pm
eventList.textContent: At this point, it is unclear what will be shared at the Board and SEGC meetings, but there will hopefully be an update on the existing proposals, the new proposal development, and next steps. You can watch the live stream through the link.

eventList.title: SE Guiding Coalition Community Conversations, RESCHEDULED Nov. 19th
eventList.textContent: The tentative agenda for the Woodstock Community Conversation will include a summary of the current status and space for families of the Woodstock Elementary community to share feedback with the District Representative, Dr. Omogbehin. You can join through the following Google Meet code/link:

eventList.title: PTA/Shu Ren Community SEGC Discussion
eventList.htmlContent:
When: Mon, Nov 8 7:00pm-9:00pm
Where: Woodstock Elementary
Join us for a conversation about the latest information coming from the SEGC and how it will affect our community.
Here is the link to the PTA/Shu Ren SEGC Discussion meeting Monday November 8, 7:00-9:00:
